title: Bootstrap
subTitle: Rapid front-end development with design consistency
overviewContent: Bootstrap has been leveraged to efficiently develop responsive web applications across multiple projects, particularly when rapid development was needed or design intervention was minimal. Pre-built components and the flexible grid system allowed consistent layouts, while predefined media queries ensured smooth adaptation across desktop, tablet, and mobile screens. Customising Bootstrap themes enabled alignment with project-specific requirements, resulting in interfaces that were both functional and visually coherent.

relatedProjects.projectName: H & H Lawyers Website and Server Migration
